notes.text: sap.m.Button: Add Ghost Button type
sap.m.FacetFilter: Update button text properly when SingleSelectMaster mode is used
sap.m.IconTabBar sap.m.QuickView sap.m.Text: Visual Tests for Android test are now fixed
sap.m.Link: removed href attribute if property href is not set
sap.m.MessageView: Header's visibility adjusted
sap.m.MultiInput: Unneeded visual test removed
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: Add possibility to set zero as a title
sap.m.Popover: Show scrollbar when overflowing and out of visible area.
sap.m.Select: TAB handling added
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Cloned item now works with binding
Opa: throw error when iFrame is launched but one already exists
sap.m.DatePicker: set max possible hour to the default maxDate
sap.m.FacetFilter: Correct selection when growing is used.
sap.m.MessagePopover: The headerButton is now being bound correctly
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: Search is now working correctly
sap.m.Text: Ellipsis is now shown when the label is required
sap.m.Timepicker: position selection frame properly in DateTimepicker on small screens
sap.m.Breadcrumbs: Fixed overflow calculations
sap.m.DatePicker: Precision of milliseconds set to the third digit
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Appointment deselection is now possible
sap.m.StepInput: Added description text after the input field.
TimePicker-closing before slider scrolling is complete works.
sap.m.Dialog: Error state icon now has correct color
sap.m.Dialog: Typo in documantation is now fixed
sap.m.FacetFilter: Reset search value when FacetFilterList is closed
sap.m.Label: Required asterix is now positioned correctly
sap.m.ListBase: Hide busy indicator on updateFinished.
sap.m.Menu: after removal from items aggregation item is still usable.
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Long title wraps on Firefox and IE
sap.m.Page: Nested pages scrolling fixed.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: does not throw exception when sap.ui.unified.CalendarLegend is used
sap.m.ProgressIndicator: Fixed handling of values greater than 100
sap.m.QuickView sap.m.NotificationListItem sap.m.Text sap.m.SplitApp: Visual tests fro Android are now fixed
sap.m.TextArea: Growing property now has a proper behavior.
sap.m.Timepicker: add validation for minutesStep and secondsStep
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: when model is changed, filter counter is updated.
sap.ui.dt:added isVisible function to designtime and visible check
sap.m.CheckBox: Added property displayOnly
sap.m.CheckBox: wrapping property added
sap.m.ListBase: Enable Drag-and-Drop
sap.m.StepInput: Out of range values are now set to min/max on pressing increase/decrease buttons
sap.m.StepInput: Support of validation mode added
sap.m.StepInput: Text alignment support added
sap.m.TimePickerSliders: New control implemented
sap.m.Tree: Enable Drag-and-Drop
sap.m.DateRangeSelection considers UTC flag in binding options.
sap.m.DateTimePicker-when picker is opened for IE & Edge, input should not be focusable
sap.m.Dialog: Drag and resize are now working correctly
sap.m.MultiInput: Fire properly change event.
sap.m.QuickView: On first load QuickView is now in full size
sap.m.StepInput: Now the buttons are being disabled accordingly
sap.m.OverFlowToolbar: Allowed sap.m.Label to overflow
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: move navigation arrows to the picker button
sap.m.DatePicker - setMin/MaxDate does not change other property.
sap.m.FacetFilter: Scroll of the items work with arrows
sap.m.GenericTile : Update Arial Label on Generic Tile content change on using TAB key navigation.
sap.m.MultiInput: Fix memory leak on cloning
sap.m.MultiInput: tokenUpdate is now fired before a token's insertion
sap.m.ObjectHeader: removed href attribute if property href is not set
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: gets title aggregation correctly now
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Appointments deselection fix
ManagedObject(-Metadata): aggregation forwarding
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Active state is now supported
sap.m.RadioButton: Aria atributes added
Tree: update aria-expanded when expander changes
demokit: docuindex.json typo
sap.m.ActionSelect: QUnit tests adjusted
sap.m.BreadCrumbs: Fixed keyboard handling for hidden items
sap.m.CheckBox: Focus outline fixed in grid and form
sap.m.DateRangeSelection - setMin/MaxDate does not change other property.
sap.m.Input: showTableSuggestionValueHelp now works correctly on IE
sap.m.ListBase: No data row should be in the tab chain.
sap.m.MessageView: Link's properties are now forwarded in detailsPage
sap.m.Panel: Blurred text in IE
sap.m.Popover: Updated: Show scrollbar when overflowing and out of visible area.
sap.m.ProgressIndicator: percentValue property correctly validated
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Focus is now correctly set
sap.m.Select: Label in IconOnly mode is now skipped
sap.m.SelectList: Only non-SeparatorItems affect setsize
sap.m.StepInput - wrong calculation when value precision is changed.
sap.m.StepInput: Update demokit example
sap.m.StepInput: fire change event only once
sap.m.StepInput: fire change event without timeout
cldr: update cldr version to v32.0.0
sap.m.DatePicker: Added initialFocusedDateValue property
sap.m.HeaderContainer - Scrolling improvements
sap.m.ListBase: new contextMenu aggregation
sap.m.SelectionDetails: Display markers in SelectionDetails
sap.m.StepInput: Value change is now sped up on press and hold of the increase/decrease button
sap.m.TimePicker: Added initialFocusedDateValue property
sap.m.TimePicker: Added switch for turning on and off MaskEnabler
: sap.m.StepInput: stepMode property introduced.
sap.m.BarInPageEnabler: remove extra aria-labelledby attribute
sap.m.Button: fire press event on keydown for 'enter' and keyup for 'space'
sap.m.FacetFilter: Select All checkbox behavior fix after a search
sap.m.HeaderContainer : The focus was getting trapped and not jump out of HeaderContainer when scroll button appears and on navigating using Tab Key.
sap.m.Input: Events order is now always correct
sap.m.Label: Label is now read by JAWS when focus sap.m.Select
sap.m.Link: fire press event on keydown for 'enter' and keyup for 'space'
sap.m.ListBase: Footer text should not be announced twice.
sap.m.MessageView, sap.m.SelectDialog, sap.m.BusyIndicator: Accessibility test pages corrected
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Change event now fires on focus leave
sap.m.MultiInput: Pasting tokens with suggestion items works correctly
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: ObjectAttribute with customContent now omit active property
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: correctly set text of the customControl aggregation
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Neutral Status Color is correct now
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Text has correct textDirection
sap.m.Page: Documentation updated
sap.m.Panel: Scrollable non-interactive content does not add an additional tab stop in FF
sap.m.ResponsivePopover: Remove internal mutation of begin and end button
sap.m.SearchField: 'search' event is now correctly fired
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Vertically aligned correctly alongside other controls
sap.m.Slider/RangeSlider: Tooltips moved to the static area
sap.m.TabContainer: fix height of the TabStrip
sap.m.TabContainer: fix removeItem with 0 as a parameter
sap.m.TextArea: Focus position in compact mode adjusted
sap.m.TileContainer - works if initial width/height is 0.
sap.m.TimePicker: fix failing unit tests on IE
sap.m.Token/Tokenizer: Not editable token text width in Safari
sap.m.Wizard: Acc test page improvement
Control: BusyIndicator animation default
Tables/List/Tree: Apply header context CSS on toolbar
sap.m.MessagePage: Added new property and aggregation
Control: refactor fnHandleInteraction
ResponsiveTable: View Settings Example should show filter info bar
sap.m.Breadcrumbs: Fixed control layout when used in Toolbar
sap.m.Button: Reference to the text content of the button is added to the AriaLabelledBy only when the button has text
sap.m.Button: focus outline on text content removed
sap.m.DateTimeInput: ACC example fixed
sap.m.Menu: recreate menu if all items are removed
sap.m.MessageBox: InitialFocus is not overwritten when details are shown
sap.m.ObjectHeader: focus fixed for HCB
sap.m.RadioButton: Focus outline corrected
sap.m.Tile: Focus is cleared indicated in HCB and HCW
sap.m.TileContainer: fix failing unit tests
sap.m.ViewSettingsPopover: remove redundat aria-labelledby for the close button
sap.m.TimePicker: 24:00 value is now supported
sap.m.DateTimeField: setDateValue accepts JS Date Object from iframe
sap.m.DateTimePicker: fix unit tests
sap.m.FacetFilter: tabindex of container element removed
sap.m.MessagePage: Positioning in ObjectPage section fixed
sap.m.ObjectStatus: added space between state and tooltip ina Aria descriprion
sap.m.ObjectStatus: getAccessibilityInfo returns the tooltip also
sap.m.Table: Selection column should be hidden from screen readers
sap.m.WizardStep: Optional step property added
sap.m.Button: focus outline is visible on click
sap.m.MultiInput: tokenUpdate documentation corrected
sap.m.NavContainer: Fixed transition issue
sap.m.ObjectNumber: explicit font size added to parent div
sap.m.RadioButton: Label width is calculated wrong on IE
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Now correctly goes into overflow when used inside OverflowToolbar
sap.m.Link: validateUrl property added
sap.m.Input: Description is now read correctly by JAWS
sap.m.MultiInput: Selecting an item now clears the input field
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: Now escapes title and text of the inner controls
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: OneMonthView in compact mode doesn't overlap dates
sap.m.Popover: beforeClose event is not fired when the Popover's closing animation is running or is already closed.
sap.m.Popover: correct header, subheader and footer DOM structure
sap.m.RangeSlider: Correct decimal precision
sap.m.RangeSlider: Tooltip exception fixed.
sap.m.RatingIndicator: Invisible node for rating announcement changed from label to span
sap.m.Tokenizer: updateToken validation called multiple times
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Default None Grouping item can be set via setSelectedGroupItem API
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Now escapes text of the inner controls
Form: activate wrapping of Labels as default
sap.m.ColorPalette: new control implemented.
sap.m.ListItemBase: do not fire press event for text selection
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Enable drag and drop of appointments
sap.m.StepInput: Typing restriction according to displayValuePrecision
sap.uxap.ObjectPageHeaderActionButton usage in OverflowToolbar
core.util.MockServer: memory optimization
sap.m.DateTimePicker: Select day when year or month are changed
sap.m.Dialog: correct header, subheader and footer DOM structure
sap.m.HeaderContainer : Qunit optimization for _getScrollValue method.
sap.m.HeaderContainer : Qunit tests were failing for _getScrollValue method as round off was not done.Added round off.
sap.m.Input: Issue with calling selectedKey from ValueHelp is now fixed.
sap.m.LightBox: Resize handler is now correctly detached
sap.m.MultiInput: More indicator is displayed correctly now
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Fixed issue when using sap.m.Select
sap.m.PDFViewer: Height on mobile/tablet is always auto.
sap.m.StandardTreeItem: setIcon function is enhanced
sap.m.Wizard: Explored app sample adjusted
sap.m.Toolbar: Added "style" property
sap.m.Button: Now when Reject or Accept button is pressed, the icon has correct color
sap.m.HeaderContainer : Added fix to check the next item is arrow key and attempt to jump out of Header container on Tab key press.
sap.m.HeaderContainer : Removed qunits related to _getScrollValue method which was getting failed because of browser dependency on return value.
sap.m.Image: DetailBox opens when Image is used with list binding
sap.m.MenuButton: Now when Reject or Accept button is pressed, the icon has correct color
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Fixed content size calculations
sap.m.PDFViewer: Mention blob URL and dataURI in documentation.
sap.m: instanceof Date in public methods corrected
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Header can now remain visible (fixed on top) on scroll
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Now appointments could be custom sorted
sap.m.Table: new property sticky
sap.ui.unified.CalendarLegend: standardItems introduced.
sap.m.Checkbox: Display type aligned in responsive grid
sap.m.MessageStrip: Add minimum height to the control
sap.m.MessageView: List item padding corrected
sap.m.MessageView: Texts in message item escaped correctly
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Focusing out should fire change event only if the value is not empty
sap.m.Panel: Remove unneeded outline
sap.m.ResponsivePopover: setShowButton should not throw an exception on mobile phone
sap.m.TabContainer: apply sapContrastPlus to the TabStrip
sap.m.Text: Added the text for one of the sample on the test page
QUnit Designtime Library tests in Firefox
sap.m.Dialog: correct padding of the subheader when Toolbar is used
sap.m.ObjectNumber: Invisible text for the ValueState updated correctly on setState
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: appointments have correct legend colors now
sap.m.SegmentedButton: native browser focus outline removed
sap.m.TabContainer: Scrolling issue in RTL on Safari corrected
sap.m.TimePicker: Value is set correctly on change.
sap.m.GrowingEnablement: Focus shouldn't jump out of the control.
sap.m.QuickView: Auto closing is now fixed
sap.m.Button: Now the icons are with the correct color when Reject/Accept/Emphasized + Disabled
sap.m.FacetFilter: correct navigation with arrow keys
sap.m.Input: SelectedItem is now correctly set when tap is pressed
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Reset cached sizes on control reset
sap.m.StepInput: pressing PageUp or PageDown doesn't scroll the page now
